üß† Job Title: Software AI Engineer
Location: [Insert Location or ‚ÄúRemote‚Äù]
Job Type: Full-Time
Department: Artificial Intelligence / Engineering
Experience Level: Mid-Level to Senior
Reports to: Lead AI Architect / Head of Engineering

üöÄ Job Summary:
We are seeking a talented and passionate Software AI Engineer to join our growing AI team. You will be responsible for designing, building, and deploying cutting-edge AI-driven software solutions that solve real-world problems. This role requires a solid foundation in software engineering combined with practical experience in machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks.

üéØ Key Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and deploy scalable AI-powered software applications and services.

Collaborate with data scientists, product managers, and backend/front-end teams to integrate AI models into products.

Build and maintain APIs and infrastructure to serve machine learning models in production.

Implement data preprocessing pipelines, model training, and evaluation workflows.

Optimize model performance for speed, accuracy, and efficiency.

Monitor and maintain deployed AI systems for reliability and performance.

Stay up-to-date with the latest advancements in AI/ML and suggest potential applications for our business.

üß∞ Required Skills & Qualifications:
Bachelor‚Äôs or Master‚Äôs degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, AI/ML, or related field.

2+ years of experience in software development with AI/ML integration.

Proficiency in Python and libraries such as TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, or Hugging Face Transformers.

Experience with REST APIs, cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure), and containerization tools like Docker.

Familiarity with DevOps practices, CI/CD pipelines, and Git version control.

Strong understanding of algorithms, data structures, and software architecture.

Ability to write clean, efficient, and well-documented code.

üí° Preferred Qualifications (Bonus):
Experience deploying AI/ML models into production environments.

Familiarity with NLP, computer vision, or generative AI systems.

Exposure to MLOps tools (e.g., MLflow, Kubeflow).

Experience working in agile teams or startups.

üíº Why Join Us?
Work on exciting real-world AI applications.

Collaborate with a talented, multidisciplinary team.

Opportunity to shape innovative AI products from the ground up.

Flexible work environment and remote options.

Competitive compensation and growth opportunities.

üì© How to Apply:
Submit your resume, GitHub/portfolio (if any), and a brief note on why you‚Äôre passionate about AI engineering to [email@example.com].
